projectPurpose: To provide a free, open-source, command-line tool for comprehensive iMessage data export, backup, archiving, and diagnostics on macOS, Linux, and Windows.
mainFeatures: Export iMessage data to open, portable formats (TXT, HTML)
Run iMessage diagnostics
Preserve multimedia content (images, videos, audio)
Support a wide array of iMessage features (replies, attachments, tapbacks, etc.)
Facilitate easy migration and archiving of message history

marketPositioning: imessage-exporter is positioned as a free and open-source, command-line solution for users who need deep, technical access and control over their iMessage data. Unlike most proprietary graphical tools that offer broad iPhone management features, imessage-exporter focuses specifically on providing a comprehensive, accurate, and diagnostic export of iMessage conversations and attachments in open formats. Its command-line interface caters to a more technical audience or those requiring automated data handling, distinguishing it from user-friendly GUI-based alternatives.
